alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 7:25PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Thundestorms producing strong wind gusts will impact Sweet Grass and southeastern Park Counties as well as the Beartooth Foothills through 800 PM MDT... Thunderstorms producing wind gusts to 50 mph will move through the area over the next hour. Strong wind gusts may move out well ahead of the parent storm. Be alert and prepared for sudden strong wind gusts even if the storm in your immediate vicinity. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Gusts to 48mph occurred in Livingston with this activity. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Big Timber, Mystic Lake, Nye, Dean, Mc Leod, and Greycliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building or vehicle if storms approach.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass
